name.description: Human-readable name of the session (e.g., 'Push Day')

exercises.description: List of exercises in this session

exercise_name.description: Name of the exercise (must reference an exercise file in exercises/ directory)

sets.description: Number of sets for this exercise in this session

percent_1rm.description: Percentage of 1RM to use for this exercise (weight is computed from exercise 1rm * percent_1rm)

date_created.description: Datetime in format YYYY-MM-DD-<unix epoch seconds>
